abstract: The 20 analysts worked in the firm’s securities division, which houses its trading operations, in New York and in London,
snippet: The 20 analysts worked in the firm’s securities division, which houses its trading operations, in New York and in London,
lead_paragraph: Landing a job as an analyst at Goldman Sachs is a golden ticket for a newcomer to Wall Street. Now 20 of those who pulled off that feat are being dismissed for cheating on an employee test, the firm says.

headline.main: Goldman Sachs Fires 20 Junior Employees Accused of Test Cheating
